title: spigotmc插件买完下载不了
author: Linggo
txt_content:
我买完插件显示
Thank you for purchasing.
When the payment is confirmed, you will be able to download the resource. It will also be available in Purchased Resources page.

上面还是显示价格
没办法下载

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
等作者回复就行了，需要作者手动给你开放下载权限的
可能有时差，说不定作者那边没起床呢
要是太久没回应的话可以直接找他（这种情况很少见）

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
When the payment is confirmed, you will be able to download the resource. It will also be available in Purchased Resources page.

需要验证支付（
好了你就可以下了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 要等作者手动确认你的购买

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
可以尝试与作者沟通
并提供有效购买截图
看看作者能不能直接给你

replies.txt_content:
